questions.question: This policy allows employees to use their personal devices for work purposes.
questions.answer: What is BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)?

questions.question: This term refers to the practice of managing and securing personal devices used for work.
This type of security threat involves unauthorized access to sensitive data on personal devices.
This term refers to the practice of separating work and personal data on a single device.
This technology is commonly used in BYOD policies to ensure secure access to corporate resources.
